series_description: This series documents the exact mileage (odometer reading) on a vehicle at the time of sale or transfer. Refer to
legal_citation: Code of Virginia, § 46.2-629. Note: Code requires mileage to be written on title or title application at time of sale. This series applies to any separate documentation held by the agency selling or disposing of vehicles.

series_description: This series documents the issue of fuels or lubricants and requests for reimbursements.
This series documents the receipt of gasoline or other services at commercial gas stations. Usually credit card receipts.
This series documents the receipt of gasoline or other services from state owned facilities. Retained to verify reimbursement requests.
This series documents the completion and submission of any mileage or usage reports.
This series documents the reporting of and/or investigation of motor vehicle accidents.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after whichever is greater;
disposition: case closure or last action, then destroy.

series_title: Motor Vehicle Maintenance Administrative Reports and Records
series_description: This series documents the administrative actions necessary to operate a maintenance facility, including maintenance related reports and other supporting records not otherwise listed on this schedule.
retention_statement: Retain as long as administratively destroy.

series_title: Motor Vehicle Maintenance Consumption and Use Records
series_description: This series documents the daily mileage, fuel use and oil consumption of individual vehicles.

series_title: Motor Vehicle Maintenance Parts and Supply Records
series_description: This series documents the ordering, inventory and use of stocks of parts, bulk lubricants and other maintenance or operating supplies.
disposition: last entry or action, then destroy.

series_title: Motor Vehicle Maintenance Repair and Service Records
series_description: This series documents the repair, maintenance and servicing of specific vehicles.
This series documents the sale, transfer or disposal of surplus, excess or nonrepairable vehicles.
This series documents the routine reporting of administrative information on motor vehicles, reports not already listed on this schedule.
This series documents the daily assignment and use of motor vehicles and other large equipment.

series_title: Motor Vehicle Use/Control Sign Out Logs/Books
series_description: This series documents the acceptance/receipt of vehicles for daily use.
This series documents the receipt and response to requests for vehicles for use on specific days.

series_title: Motor Vehicle Use/Control Vehicle Assignment Records
series_description: This series documents the long term or permanent assignment of vehicle to specific individuals, offices or uses. Procurement Records This series documents the procurement of vehicles for agency use.
retention_statement: Retain 2 years after Refer to General Records Schedule No. GS-102, guidelines.
disposition: reassignment or return, then destroy. Retention and Disposition Fiscal Records for retention

series_description: This series documents the inspection of vehicles by approved inspection stations station copies. Refer to
legal_citation: Code of Virginia, § 46.2-1163. Registrations Vehicle This series documents registration and licensing of agency owned vehicles. Refer to Code of Virginia, § 46.2-600.

series_description: This series documents that vehicle has been inspected at an approved inspection station. Refer to
retention_statement: Retain until next reinspection transfer with vehicle.

series_title: Vehicle Repair Work Orders Requestor’s Copy
series_description: This series documents the request for repair or service work from a vehicle maintenance facility.

series_title: Vehicle Repair Work Orders Shop Copies
series_description: This series documents the receipt of a work order and actions taken in response.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after of, whichever is greater;
disposition: last action or until vehicle disposed then destroy.

series_description: This series documents the legal ownership and titling of vehicles. Refer to
